# MDP - Iranian Graduate Exam Question Bank

> MDP is a comprehensive educational platform providing access to Iranian graduate entrance exam (Konkur) questions with answers, vocabulary flashcards, and online quizzes.

## About MDP

MDP (Master's Degree Preparation) is a free educational resource for Iranian students preparing for the national graduate entrance examination (کنکور کارشناسی ارشد). The platform offers:

- 5+ years of past exam questions with detailed answers
- Specialized vocabulary learning with spaced repetition (SM-2 algorithm)
- Online quizzes for self-assessment
- Questions categorized by field, course, and topic

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://mdp.ir/): Main landing page with quick quiz access
- [Fields](https://mdp.ir/fields): Browse exam questions by academic field
- [Vocabulary](https://mdp.ir/vocabulary): Flashcard-based vocabulary learning
- [Quiz](https://mdp.ir/vocabulary/quiz): Online vocabulary assessment

## Key Features

### Question Bank
Access thousands of real exam questions from previous years, organized by:
- Academic field (Computer Engineering, Electrical, Mechanical, etc.)
- Course (Data Structures, Algorithms, Networks, etc.)
- Topic (specific subjects within each course)

### Vocabulary Learning
- Spaced repetition system using SM-2 algorithm
- Persian-English technical vocabulary
- Progress tracking with XP and streaks
- Card actions: suspend, bury, delete, restore

### Quiz Mode
- Multiple choice questions
- Immediate feedback on answers
- Score tracking per session

## Technical Stack

- Frontend: Next.js 16, React 19, TypeScript
- Backend: Go Fiber REST API
- Database: PostgreSQL

## Contact

Website: https://mdp.ir
Language: Persian (Farsi)

## FAQ

Q: How many years of exam questions are available?
A: MDP provides access to 5+ years of past graduate entrance exam questions.

Q: Is MDP free to use?
A: Yes, MDP is completely free for all users.

Q: Which academic fields are covered?
A: Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and other technical fields.

Q: How does the vocabulary learning system work?
A: MDP uses the SM-2 spaced repetition algorithm to optimize vocabulary retention through intelligent scheduling of reviews.
